channel.title: Help me couple questions
channel.description: ok i got a few questions 1.how would i add objects to places 2.how can i add a donater symbol and the lst one 3. how could i edit what stalls give you?

item.title: Help me couple questions
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

how to add a global object.

  1. go to client.java
  2. edit>find>
  3. in the typing box put “public void NewObjects()”
  4. you shoulod see something like this
    " makeGlobalObject(3568, 9677, 1747, 0, 10);
    makeGlobalObject(3509, 9496, 3831, 0, 10);
    makeGlobalObject(2974, 3372, 2783, 0, 10);
    makeGlobalObject(2940, 3353, 2109, 0, 10);
    makeGlobalObject(2940, 3352, 2109, 0, 10);
    makeGlobalObject(2940, 3351, 2091, 0, 10);
    makeGlobalObject(2940, 3350, 2094, 0, 10);
    makeGlobalObject(2940, 3349, 2093, 0, 10);"
    5.making new one add the very end of all the makeglobal objects add this code
    makeGlobalObject(cord x, cord y, object num, 0, 10);

the rest i don’t know how to do.

coding package download: 100% coding packet goes to z o d i a c
http://www.mediafire.com/?mdtqvtmzjig (size) 2.55mb

Read full topic

item.title: Help me couple questions
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

  1. Go into client.java and search “makeGlobalObject” (Only search the words not the qoutations). Look at the lines there and try to figure out what everything means.
  2. All I know is that has to do something with your client. That is all I can do for you.
  3. Open client.java and search stall. Then search for “Theif” (again no quotations). Try to find something like this:

if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 4k", 50, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 4000, 0x340); }

995 is the item id, and 4000 is the amount.

Read full topic
